n, m: nat

m + S n = S n + m

Qed.```

intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

```coq
intros net h h' t lli llt t'.
intros HcandidateEntriesTerm.
unfold candidateEntriesTerm in HcandidateEntriesTerm.
destruct HcandidateEntriesTerm as [h'' [HwonElection [HcurrentTerm Htype]]].
unfold update_elections_data_requestVote.
unfold update.
rewrite <- HcurrentTerm.
rewrite <- Htype.
apply handleRequestVoteReply_preserves_candidate_entries in HwonElection.
eauto.
Qed.

original: intros net h h' t lli llt t'. intros HcandidateEntriesTerm. unfold candidateEntriesTerm in HcandidateEntriesTerm. destruct HcandidateEntriesTerm as [h'' [HwonElection [HcurrentTerm Htype]]]. unfold update_elections_data_requestVote. unfold update. rewrite <- HcurrentTerm. rewrite <- Htype. apply handleRequestVoteReply_preserves_candidate_entries in HwonElection. eauto.
